N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 110.2 - Requirements for approval of a summer secondary school

State Regulations

To be approved, a summer secondary school shall: (a) except in the case of a program approved
pursuant to section
110.5
of this Part, comprise the
summer session of a registered secondary school and use the building(s) and
equipment of such school or other suitable facility as approved by the

Commissioner of Education; (b) provide a secondary school program during the months of July and August of at
least 20 hours of instruction, exclusive of days used for registration, final
examinations or Regents examinations; (c) employ teachers who are certified to
teach in the secondary schools of this State and assign such teachers to teach
only the courses in which they are certified, and use paraprofessionals as
needed; and
(d) provide daily
instructional sessions of at least one hour but not more than 5 1/2
hours. Notes
